full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,AO RGYAN PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I MDOS GZHUNG CHUNG BA LAS, ,DGOS PA LA 'UR PHAN PHYIR 'DI, ,MDOS SKOR RIN CHEN BANG MDZOD BZHUGS,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025B ('BYOR BA CHE CHUNG 'GA' ZHIG PHAN SNYAM PAS, ,MDOS BSKOR RIN CHEN BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA, ,'DI NI YUL KHAMS MTHAR SKYES GYI NA PA, ,NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR RIN CHEN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS 'GRO KUN LAS NYON DBANG, ,BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD BSAL, ,TSE RING NAD MED TSI 'DIR BDE SKYID LDAN, ,'CHI TSE BLA MA MGON DANG BRAL MED SHOG ,GTO GLUD GTONG LA MKHAS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS, ,TSE 'DI'I LTOS GOS PHYIR DU GZHAN NOR PHYUGS, ,BLANG BA'I THABS ZHES NGAN ZHING @026A *, ,'PHYA BA NA, ,CHOS KYI SBYIN PA LA SOGS 'DIR TSANG NGO, ,DANG POR SEMS BSKYED NAS BZUNG STE, ,THA MA'I CHOS SBYIN PAR DU NI, ,LEGS PAR DPYAD NA CI 'GYUR SHES, ,DE PHYIR NAG 'GROS BKOD PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
